document_data.name: Geoffrey
document_data.Description: Geoffrey was a huge fat man.
document_data.Personality: Being an accomplished aleman, Geoffrey sold light and dark [[wikipedia:ale|ale]], but his [[Callidyrr mead]] was prized by his patrons.
document_data.History: In [[1345 DR]], the guard [[Erian]] entered his tent during the Festival of the Spring Equinox and met [[Kazgoroth]] disguised as the peasant, ''Meridith''.
